    ↓
set_current_mod() - Establish analysis context
    ↓
handle_import() - Main orchestrator
    ├─ Built-in module? → Record edge, return
    ├─ External module? → Record edge, return module name
    └─ Internal module?
        ↓
        _handle_import_level() - Parse relative imports
        ↓
        _do_import() - Load and register
        ↓
        Graph Data Management - Record in graph
            ↓
        Return module path for
